message.title: Welcome to my first post
message.message: This should now work as required, I ran out of time for extras.
message.name: Sven

message.title: Defacement protection and bad word check
message.message:
<script>alert('alert');</script> -> this will not be run but instead gets shown as is.
Here are some bad words: ****, ****, aSShole, a$$ still shows though..
message.name: Sven

message.title: checking for smileys😀
message.message:
hello, I'm a very 😁 person that only gets 🤬sometimes
most of the time I'm a complete 😇
message.name: Sven

message.title: Hello
message.message: is it me you're looking for!
message.name: Sven

message.title: Hello,
message.message:
it's me
I was wondering if after all these years you'd like to meet
To go over everything
They say that time's supposed to heal ya
But I ain't done much healing
message.name: Sven

message.title: Wie is er aan de lijn hallo, hallo
message.message: ik mis je zo, mijn teleromeo
message.name: K3

message.title: Hello hello hello
message.message:
Hello hello hello
Nice to meet you
I mark a new love
message.name: Mari Ferrari

message.title: Well, you had me from "Hello"
message.message:
I felt love start to grow the moment I looked into your eyes,
You won me, it was over from the start.
You completely stole my heart, and now you won't let go.
I never even had a chance you know?
You had me from "Hello"
message.name: Kenny Chesney

message.title: Hello
message.message: me again, just adding random messages to test the display choice.
message.name: Sven
